definition: Haiyan county in Jiaxing 嘉興|嘉兴[Jia1 xing1], Zhejiang
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Haiyan county in Jiaxing 嘉興|嘉兴[Jia1 xing1], Zhejiang

sentences.english: Haiyantang Bridge is a new-type self-anchored suspension bridge in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江海盐塘桥工程为一新型的自锚式悬索桥结构。

sentences.english: Sea salt source contribution to the coast aerosol increased with the diameter of particulate.
sentences.chinese: 海盐源对气溶胶的贡献随气溶胶粒径增大而增加。

sentences.english: Retire to bathe in salt-water (use sea salt) before the ritual.
sentences.chinese: 仪式前请用海盐水洗澡。

sentences.english: ScienceDaily (Mar. 11, 2010) —The smell of sea salt in the air is a romanticized feature of life along a seacoast.
sentences.chinese: 空气中海盐的味道是海边生活的一个浪漫元素。

sentences.english: Silly city people panic buying salt, afraid that all sea salt from today on will have been exposed to radiation.
sentences.chinese: 小市民疯狂抢购盐，恐怕日后的海盐受到核辐射。

sentences.english: Haiyan County lies on the south of shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 海盐县位于上海的南面。

sentences.english: This place is famous for abounding in sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 这里以盛产海盐而得名。

sentences.english: Table salt has a chemical added to make it white in color. Better alternative is Bragg's aminos or sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 食盐为使颜色变白而渗有化学添加物，最好选择海盐。

sentences.english: Put ingredients in a stockpot with 1 tsp sea salt and cover with water.
sentences.chinese: 将所有的原料放入汤锅，加1勺海盐，加水盖没。

sentences.english: Sprinkle some Maldon salt all over the pastry top.
Or keep it simple with just some sea salt and black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 或者简单的放些海盐和黑胡椒粉。

sentences.english: At this ‘mature stage’, sea salt could be harvested for commercial use.
sentences.chinese: 在这个成熟期，海盐可以作为商业用途被采集。

sentences.english: The smell of sea salt in the air is a romanticized feature of life along a seacoast.
sentences.chinese: 空气中海盐的味道是海边生活的一个浪漫元素。

sentences.english: Better alternative is Bragg's aminos or sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 好的替代品是布拉格氨基酸或海盐。

sentences.english: Chloride Raw goat milk, fish, unrefined sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 氯化物纯山羊奶，鱼，未经提炼的海盐。

sentences.english: The salt shoal is an indispensable production material for solarizing sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 盐滩是晒制海盐最为基本的场产资本。
